title: RBI imposes monetary penalty on HSBC for LRS reporting violations
description: The Reserve Bank of India has imposed a monetary penalty of Rs 36.38 lakh on HSBC Limited for violating reporting requirements under the Liberalised Remittance Scheme, despite the bank's response to a show cause notice.
